You may not be able to make a full size person fall in love with you or someone else for that matter, however you did believe that you could use the smaller Deluthian's to obtain your harem which made your heart feel like it skipped a beat in excitement.


Your plan to create a harem needed all your maids to like each other and that would require a plan and each choice gave more freedom at the risk that the dream would fall apart.

Your name is Nick and ever since Deluthia was shrunk and they were being sold off people always wondered what it would really be like to play with tinies, but sadly it was only one world out of many worlds in the galaxy.
Supply and demand meant each Deluthian cube sold by Deborah Manning's company would cost too much for most citizens and wouldn't last long as nobody could afford stasis technology even it were allowed to be used in their areas.

This is where your buisness plan came into effect; you bought Deluthian's and created a theme park where guests could be scaled down into special cubes to enjoy being a giant or giantess to the insignificant tiny Deluthians.

Scale Park from glance was a large warehouse which had many tables filled with tiny landscape filled with Deluthians. There were also private boxes where guests did not need to be displayed to the public eye but that cost more and you wanted to show guests entering the magic of the sizer technology.

New guests could look down into the boxes at the smaller guests playing around in the microscopic cities while the smaller guests would be oblivious to this as stasis technology changed their perspective as they would only see sky above them as if they had been transported to another world.
In the backroom were smaller cubes where guests could indulge in their sexual fantasies without being in the watchful eye of the public.

Sizers were rigged to the building and security prevented misuse of the system so the only method of being shrunk or grown was in special chambers which had special boxes used for carrying guests safely to each enclosure.
Each container had stasis technology which removed G-forces so there was very little discomfort and large enforced glass panes allow guests to see where staff are taking them.
_________

Your shift had started up and the scale park was in full swing.
As you browsed the tables you notice a bunch of girls sunbathing as giantess' on the beach, one of the girls was teasing the ground in a lustful way which you were unsure if that was getting too sexual or not but she read the terms and conditions regarding being seen by the public eye so it was up to her.

If any trouble did happen on the tables you could reach into the stasis field containing the landscape table and pick out the troublemakers, but that didn't seem to be the case this time.
You drew a short sigh thinking how it might of felt to hold that girl in your hands but your policy was to not touch the guests directly unless it was absolutely necessary.

154.content:
Your name is Dan and your a research student being funded by a large corporation to develop a new form of stasis field.

After a group of presentations you present your findings and show off an experiment to prove your research, but to your dismay the experiment fails as all the electrics in the building and the local grid go offline.
In shame of the situation and the outcry from the locals your company sponsor stop their funding and the university asks that you leave as it had cost them a great deal.

Confused why the experiment had failed, you wander back to your dormitory feeling down and gloomy as not only did the experiment fail but you felt like you shamed the university and lost out on being one of the biggest business partners in the world.

As you walked back you suddenly saw flashes of light coming from the sky, a tingling sensation in your skin and a sinking feeling in your stomach.
As you approached a bunch of students they walked on like nothing was wrong so you thought perhaps it was just you and continued back worrying you were suffering some kind of trauma from your incident earlier.


Resting in your room you look to the ceiling and sigh. 'What a depressing day, it can't get any worse' you thought until a moment later and then you realized it could.

The ground shook and you were feeling an earthquake as books fell off your shelves. You looked out the window and to your disbelief you saw gigantic male fingers in the sky touching some kind of invisible barrier.
"Have fun with your world Miss" A thunderous voice spoke before you saw another set of fingers which had nail varnish on grabbed the same spot.
The giantess in the sky giggled sending vibrations onto your world. "I will"

Your heart was racing and were trying to understand what happened when suddenly one of your books flew into your face and your vision went to black.
__________

You woke up lying on your bed and all your books seemed to be back on your shelf so you wondered if you just had a nightmare, still it was very bizarre.

Relaxing for a moment you think about your earlier experiment, but once again your thoughts were interrupted as you heard thundering giggling coming from the horizon.
It was the same as the girl from your nightmare, no it can't be.. can it?

Leaving your room you bump into a student and you asked if he had heard a loud noise a moment ago and he simply shrugged, claiming he hadn't heard a thing and then decided to carry on his normal day business.

Something was weird, why were everybody ignoring the loud noise of some monstrous girl, was it just him?
Gigantic fingers suddenly came through the sky and rubbed the landscape in the distance into oblivious and your heart beat began to race again. You look back down from the horizon and see the student you just spoken with simply carry on walking as if nothing was happening.

"Hmm maybe I should make this a bit bigger" The titanic voice spoke before there was a flash in the sky again and the tingling sensation from before returned.
"There that's better" The voice spoke, you noticed the fingers were no longer as gigantic and you were starting to understand what had happened to you; your world had been shrunk.

"Now to fix the landscape" The voice declared and suddenly you found yourself approaching the student you spoke with earlier.
"Oh do you need something?" He asked, I shook my head "Sorry, thought you were somebody else" You lied and let him continue on his way.

_______

Things had fallen into place now.
Your world was shrunk, the girl seemed to be able to move you back in time and nobody on the world seemed to notice what she was doing.

Your name is Laura and you weren't particularly wealthy yet you wanted to get your hands on some shrunken people. Deluthian's were out the question as they were too expensive to buy and you didn't want anybody to know you indulged in such fantasies, especially to your children.

A plan came together when you heard about the matchbox size cryopods which were used to contain a person suspended in time so they could be used for a task without worrying about the cost of human requirements.

Individuals would be shrunk placed in a tiny capsule and frozen by a stasis field until the buyer releases them by pressing a button on the tiny capsule allowing to unfreeze, re-enlarge and by holding the button return them back to their pod at a moments notice.

Your plan was brilliant, you had a hacked card which you could pay for the shrinkies and since it was a subscription service you didn't need to have any money upfront.
_________

Arriving on a planet in the far reaches of the galaxy you browse through the store amazed that all the shelves were filled with finger sized capsules with tiny people inside. Below the capsules the shelves had stats for the people inside so the user could best pick a shrinkie for their needs.

Each shelf had a sign saying professions and there many to choose from.
Medical, Engineering, Construction, Piloting, Diver, Dancer and to your surprise even Prostitution was listed.

Admiring the selection a staff member sees you and walks over.
"Are you interested in hiring one of our specials for your service" The woman staff member asks. You nod while she was thinking of service as jobs, your mind was without a doubt more naughty.

"Perhaps you would like a demonstration" The staff member said as she picked up a capsule of a man who listed as a teacher.
Pressing the button on the capsule you watch as the tiny man begins to stir.
The man looks round slightly disorientated, looks up and notices the staff member next to you.

"I teach Meteorology, Maths and Geography" the tiny man spoke.
His voice was quiet and like all the other shrinkies you noticed the spandex suit he was wearing. The staff member presses a button and then the man quickly grows to full-size in front of you.

You quickly eye the man over. "Do you lot always wear such outfits?" You question.
The staff member blushed trying to think of a response but the man responded.
"These suits are built to last while conventional clothes would wear away over time. Rest assured madam that I'll be dressed more respectably when in your service"

The staff member smiled at the man meekly before holding the button the man's capsule down. A quick spark of light from the man and the capsule and you found the man tiny again frozen in the capsule.

Placing the capsule back you thank the staff member and continue browsing before you start to collect a bunch of capsules to take to the counter.
"Er madam why do you need so many people?" She asked as it seemed odd that she would rent so many individuals.

"Oh I'm starting up a center on a remote planet so I need to make sure I have some help if required" You lied.
The staff member shrugged. "Fair enough" and begun calculating the cost of all the people you collected.
You felt your heart skip when the staff member picked up the shrinkies with professions such as dancer and prostitution, however it seemed she wasn't reading the labels and was only focused on the price for each.

Handing the woman your hacked card you set up a contract to that card. Having set up your subscription service to these shrinkies you walk out with your new products.
Excitement gave you butterflies in your stomach as you returned to your ship and headed home, unaware to the staff member you would not be charged and the card you logged at the shop didn't exist or at least it won't after a couple of days.

____________

Returning home you hide your shrinkiee capsules in your handbag while you scout the house to see who is currently in. You had 2 daughters, one of them was still at school and the other was at college. You also had a son who lived away with his girlfriend and your husband worked in the navy and was always away on duty.

Discovering the coast was clear you head to your room.
Your selection of shrinkies was..

info.brief_description: Giantess and shrinking, all sizes and themes.
info.description:
INTRO: The greatest threat to the galaxy at large was a race of people living on the planet Deluthia, they attacked and bombed the peace loving people of the neighboring star systems, plundering and pillaging like pirates of the days of lore. After decades of one disaster after another, the galaxy banned together to finally put a stop to the onslaught once and for all. They insisted upon the most peaceful and humane manner possible since all guns and bombs had been outlawed for centuries. They grouped together their largest star ships with sizing rays normally used for shipping and mass transport to instead shrink the planet Deluthia to no more than a fraction of it's original size. In one final swoop they made the entire world and its race of war monging humans no longer a threat.

Now it's time to celebrate the victory, to drink champagne and have celebrations in every city of every world that peace has once again come to the galaxy, but there is something else to do... Your new job is working for a company who wishes to profit from all of this. They were behind the "solution" and now the dollar signs are the new flag of peace. You must go to Deluthia, cram whole city blocks into ornamental decorative boxes, and sell them on the open market.
It's time for everyone to buy, "A Piece Of The Enemy".

So far anything goes, please don't kill yourself off to quickly ;o)
